makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each of creature within {#} foot radius range is subject to being {@condition frightened} for 1 minute, unless they succeed a {@dc {#}} Wisdom save . The <$name$> may choose to exclude whatever creatures they wish from the effect of their frightful presence.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the <$name$> or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Horrifying Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature of the creature's choice within range must make a Wisdom saving throw ({@dc {#}}) or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Danger Sense
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks  and Dexterity saving throws against attacks it can see when it is not {@condition blinded}, {@condition deafened}, or {@condition incapacitated}. and can't be surprised.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Relentless
entries: If the <$name$> takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While it is grappling a creature, the <$name$> takes only half the damage dealt to it, and the creature {@condition grappled} by the <$name$> takes the other half.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Angelic Weapons
entries: <$name$>s's weapon attacks are magical. When <$name$> hits with any weapon, the weapon deals an extra > # < ({@damage }) radiant damage (included in the attack).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Enlarge
entries: <$name$> can magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. Input the extra damage inflicted per round whilst enlarged.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Possession
entries: <$name$> can control another creature, during which time it cannot be targeted by nearly any effect.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Constrict
entries: The creature has the ability to restrain and/or grapple a target as part of an attack. When <$name$> makes an attack it has the ability to restrain and/or grapple a target as part of an attack. (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Web
entries: <$name$> can generate a web which acts as a ranged Weapon Attack that upon hit {@condition restrained|restrains} the target on a hit. the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hexproof
entries: <$name$> is under the effect of a person area of effect {@spell globe of invulnerability} against non-allied spells targeted specifically at him - AoE spells will still effect <$name$>, when you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, the <$name$> can deal an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the <$name$> that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Parry
entries: <$name$> adds its proficiency bonus to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it as a reaction.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Superior Invisibility
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can magically turn {@condition invisible} until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the <$name$> wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorb (x)
entries: Damage resistance (DR 2* x)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Shroud
entries: This creature can't be the target of a targeted spell; but can be affected by AoE spell or spell like effect (Magic Missle; Friends cannot taget this creature; but Fireball;Sleep can effect it)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Astral Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action on its turn, the <$name$> can transport itself to the astral plane, or back to the plane it was on last. When it transports itself in this way, it returns to a location within 30 feet of where it was the last time it was in whichever plane it's transporting itself to.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Crypt Fatigue
entries: A creature infected with crypt fatigue gains one level of {@condition exhaustion} immediately, and gains one more level every time it fails the {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw after taking damage from a <$name$>. An infected creature must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw at the end of every long rest; with a successful save, it recovers from one level of {@condition exhaustion}, but with a failed save, it gains one level of {@condition exhaustion}. The disease is cured when the victim no longer has any levels of {@condition exhaustion}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the <$name$>'s stench for 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Regeneration
entries: <$name$> regains {10} hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fading
entries: Creatures with fading have 3+d4 rounds of combat before they disappear, increase their HP by 20%. Put a marker for their fade count down. A creature that fades, but doesn't get defeated... doesn't award EXP. Its body fades regardless at the end of its fade period. Bit and pieces take from its corpse can be held in preserver/special bag and are valuable (3x the gp reward)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Deadly Critical
entries: If the <$name$> scores a critical whenever its attack rolls a natural 19 or 20.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Devastating Charge
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a {specific attack} attack on the same turn, the target takes and extra 6 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}, in which case the <$name$> can make another attack with its claws against it as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Devour (attack)
entries: If both of a <$name$> claw attacks or is grappled or grappling a creature; if its bite attack hit the same target, the  <$name$> gains temporary hit points equal to the piercing damage done by its bite attacks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Discorporate
entries: At any point during its turn, the <$name$> can collapse into a pile of individual parts that {verb} away . As long as any of the parts survive, they can collect and breed and create a new body for the <$name$> a few weeks or months later, depending on the amount of damage the larva mage has taken (the exact time is up to DM discretion).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Displacement
entries: The<$name$> projects a magical illusion that makes it appear to be standing near its actual location, causing attack rolls against it to have disadvantage. If it is hit by an attack, this trait is disrupted until the end of its next turn. This trait is also disrupted while the<$name$> is {@condition incapacitated} or has a speed of 0.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Distracting Hand
entries: As a bonus action, while the <$name$> has the Mage Hand spell active, it can designate a creature within 5 feet of the spectral hand. The <$name$> has advantage on its attack rolls against that creature until the end of the turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Split (ooze)
entries: If an attack does 10 or more slashing damage to a <$name$>, slices off a chunk of the <$name$> and it becomes an independent <$name$>. The <$name$> has hit points equal to the slashing damage caused by the attack, and the parent <$name$> hit points are reduced by an equal amount (in addition to the damage caused by the attack). The new <$name$> makes one attack immediately as a reaction against one adjacent foe, then joins the initiative order at the same point as its parent.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Split (undead)
entries: A <$name$> that has {#}  maximum hit points or more immediately can split into two individual <$name$>, each with a current hit point total equal to half the original current hit points and {3} maximum hit points. Both of these <$name$> continue to use the original initiative.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aberrant Quickness (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: <$name$> can take an extra action on its turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ability Damage/Drain Immunity
entries: <$name$> is immune to any effect that would damage or drain it's ability scores.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorb Arcane Energy
entries: Any arcane spell targeted at the <$name$> is automatically absorbed into its body. This cures 1 point of damage per 3 points of damage the spell would otherwise deal; nondamaging spells cure 1 point of damage per spell level. Spells that affect an area are not absorbed, but neither do they affect the <$name$>. The <$name$> can't absorb magic from spells that it cast itself using arcane spell mimicry, and it can't absorb divine magic, which affects it normally.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorb Channeled Energy
entries: If a <$name$> is in the area of effect of a turn undead attempt, it gains temporary hit points. For each <$name$> that would have been affected by the turning if it were a zombie, the <$name$> gains 10 temporary hit points, to a maximum of 60.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorb Flesh
entries: The body of a creature that dies while {@condition grappled} by a <$name$> is completely absorbed into the <$name$>'s mass. No portion of it remains to be used in raise dead, reincarnate, and comparable spells that require touching the dead person's body.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorb Impurities
entries: <$name$> can absorb poisons or diseases from another creature, living or dead, and turn it to <$name$>'s use. It can expose a fresh cut to a source of disease or poison and safely absorb the dormant affliction into its blood stream. It can then inflict the disease or poison on another by spitting a stream of blood at its target creature. On a successful hit as a ranged spell attack, the target creature is exposed to the disease or poison and must proceed with whatever saving throws are required.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorb Magic
entries: As a bonus action, <$name$> targets any creature, object, or magical effect within 10 feet of it. The creature chooses a spell already cast on the target. If the spell is of 3rd level or lower, it absorbs the spell and it ends. If the spell is of 4th level or higher, it must make a check with a +9 modifier. The DC equals 10 + the spell's level. On a successful check, <$name$> absorbs the spell and it ends. <$name$>'s body glows when it absorbs a spell, as if under the effect of a light spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorb Potion
entries: The <$name$> can absorb any potion, oil, tincture, or alchemical draught that touches it, choosing to be affected by the substance or to nullify it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorb the Weave
entries: When <$name$> counters or dispels a spell, it heals damage equal to twice the spell level.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorption, <type>
entries: Whenever <$name$> is subjected to {Dmg_Type} damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hitpoints equal to the {Dmg_Type} damage dealt.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Absorption, Necrotic
entries: Whenever <$name$> is subjected to necrotic damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hitpoints equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Abyssal Essence
entries: When <$name$> is damaged, a thick, stringy, black ichor made from the essence of the deep Abyss flows from the wounds in response. Any creature that deals damage to the <$name$> with a melee attack must succeed on a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage and be {@condition restrained} until the end of its next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Acid Blood
entries: When <$name$> takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 5 feet of the takes ({@damage }) acid damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Action Surge (Recharges After a Short or Long Rest)
entries: After taking an action on its turn, the <$name$> can take one additional action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Acute Sight
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Perception checks that rely on sight.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Adapt
entries: If <$name$> Conjured/Summoned, its controller may (as a reaction) use a unused HD to grant advantage to its attack and gain temporary HP equal to the number HD its summoner expended.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Advanced Telepathy
entries: <$name$> can perceive the content of any telepathic communication used within 60 ft. of it, and it can't be surprised by creatures with any form of telelpathy.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Affinity
entries: <$name$>'s casting level is effectively 1 level higher and spell slots are cast as if 1 level greater while in their affinity is present.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Afterlife (x)
entries: When this creature is dropped to 0HP, its corpse breaks apart making {#} number of CR 1/2 versions of <$name$>

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Air Hatred
entries: <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against airborne opponents.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Air Mastery
entries: Airborne creatures have tactical disadvantage on attack rolls against <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Alert
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Initiative rolls and Wisdom (Perception) checks and can't be surprised while it is conscious.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Alien Mind
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: All-Around Vision
entries: Attackers never gain advantage on attacks or bonus damage against <$name$> from the presence of nearby allies. It has advantage on all sight-based perception checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Alter Energy Type (1/Turn)
entries: When the <$name$> casts a spell with a spell slot and the spell deals acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, radiant, or thunder damage, it can substitute that damage with one other type from that list.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Alter Saving Throw (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the <$name$> casts a spell with a spell slot and the spell requires a saving throw, it can change the saving throw from one ability score to another of its choice.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Alternate Form
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can assume the form of {form description}, or a hybrid of this and its natural form. {Details of form's abilities}. <$name$> remains in this form until he returns to human form as a bonus action or he falls {@condition unconscious} or dies.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ambuscade
entries: Gain a first attack round before battle starts; and gains +10 initative.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Amplify
entries: Gain +1 dmg and regain +1 temporary hp per each creature type within 10ft of the amplify type

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Annihilating Aura
entries: Any creature that starts its turn with in 40 feet of the <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc #} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage and grant the <$name$> advantage on attack rolls against it until the start of the creature's next turn. Undead are immune to this aura.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Annihilator
entries: Disintegrate (per spell) (Recharge [1 per 2 points of annihilator]); each disentegrate must be a separate target

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Antennae
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Antimagic Cone
entries: The <$name$> creates an area of antimagic, as in the {@spell antimagic field} spell, in a x-foot cone. At the start of each of its turns, the beholder decides which way the cone faces and whether the cone is active. The area works against the beholder's own eye rays.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Antimagic Shell
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against spells, and any creature making a spell attack against the <$name$> has disadvantage on the attack roll. If the <$name$> succeeds on its saving throw against a spell or a spell attack misses it, an additional effect might occur, as determined by rolling a {@dice d8}:

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Arcane Shot (x/period)
entries: When the <$name$> hits a creature with a ranged weapon attack, it can apply one of the following effects to the target in addition to the damage of the attack:

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Arcane Surge
entries: If the <$name$> hits a creature with a spell attack, it may choose to double the dice rolled for cold damage. (Recharge after Short or Long Rest)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Arcane Ward
entries: <$name$> has a magical ward that has {30} temp hit points. Whenever <$name$> takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, the creature takes any remaining damage. When the creature casts an abjuration spell of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of temporary hit points equal to twice the level of the spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Armor-Piercing Bite
entries: The bony ridges that a <$name$> has for teeth can chew through metal or wood. When a <$name$> scores a critical hit with its bite attack, the target's armor or shield (GM's choice), if any, loses one point of armor protection; e.g., a damaged shield provides just one point of AC instead of two, or a chain shirt provides AC 12+Dex mod instead of AC 13+Dex mod. This damage is cumulative, but it can be repaired by an armorer for 20% of the armor or shield's new cost per critical hit inflicted on it. Magical properties continue to function while the armor or shield is damaged.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Darkness
entries: <$name$> is permanently enveloped by a sphere of darkness with a 15-foot radius. Other than the aura's size and duration, it behaves exactly as the darkness spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Fervor
entries: An ally that is within 30 feet of <$name$> and can see and hear <$name$> has advantage to saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}, and all attack rolls against enemies within 30 feet of <$name$>, provided that <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura Of Life
entries: When an undead creature starts its turn within 30 feet of <$name$>, it must succeed on a {@dc } Wisdom saving throw or be turned until the end of its next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Loss
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc #} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws and grant <$name$> advantage on attack rolls against it until the start of <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Malice
entries: All enemies within 10 feet of <$name$> have disadvantage on saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Misfortune
entries: Bad luck radiates from the <$name$> in an aura with a 60-foot radius. Hostile creatures in that area have disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks and saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura Of Necromancy's Bane
entries: Necromancy spells can't be cast within 120 feet of the <$name$>. When an undead creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$>, it must make a {@dc } Constitution saving throw, taking <number> ({@damage }) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Protection
entries: The <$name$> and friendly creatures within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws. The <$name$> must be concious to grant this bonus.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Submission
entries: While <$name$> is wielding the Ruby Rod, a creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc 27} Wisdom saving throw, unless <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature must kneel and bow before <$name$> until the start of its next turn. Until this kneeling and bowing ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to <$name$>'s Aura of Submission for the next 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura Of The Funeral Feast
entries: <$name$> gains <number> ({@dice }) temporary hp whenever a creature dies within 10 feet of it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of the Sea
entries: Creatures that start their turn within 5 feet of the <$name$> must make a {@dc #} Dexterity saving throw, taking <number> ({@damage }) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of the Threshold
entries: While the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated}, allies within 30 feet of it have advantage on death saving throws.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Tragedy
entries: A creature that fails a death saving throw within 25 feet of the <$name$>, must remove one success from its previous death saving throws if it has any and gains disadvantage on its next death saving throw.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Treachery
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that has one or more of its allies within 5 feet of it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Virulence
entries: Creatures that would normally be resistant or immune to poison damage or the {@condition poisoned} condition lose their resistance or immunity while within 120 feet of <$name$>. All other creatures within 120 feet of <$name$> have disadvantage on saving throws against effects that cause poison damage or the {@condition poisoned} condition.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura of Warding
entries: The <$name$> and friendly creatures within 30 feet of it have resistance to damage from spells.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aura Of Wind
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 15 feet of the <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc #} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 15 feet away from the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aversion to Daylight
entries: <$name$> shuns light. While exposed to natural (not magical) sunlight, they have tactical disadvantage on all attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Aversion To Water
entries: If <$name$> takes cold damage or is doused with at least three gallons of water, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Awaken
entries: This creature was a creature with low mental development and was either {@spell Awaken|Awakened} or through other means evolved.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Awaken Plants (1/Month)
entries: This plant can magically awaken one plant it touches. The effect is identical to the awaken spell, but only live plants can be awakened.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Awe Aura
entries: All creatures within 30 feet must make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw in order to attack <$name$>. On a failed save, the attacking creature's turn ends immediately. On a success, that creature is immune to the Awe Aura of all <creature_subtype (example Gemstone Dragon)> for 1 week.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Awesome Charge
entries: When <$name$> uses a dash action, creatures that try to use reactions or readied actions against it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or cannot use the action or reaction.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: <$name$> can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Banding
entries: Creatures with banding gain +2 AC when within 10ft of an ally, and may use its reaction to impose disadvantage on attacks against an ally within rage for an attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the <$name$> deals 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Battle Command
entries: As a bonus action, <$name$> targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear <$name$>, the target can use its reaction to make one melee attack or to take the Dodge or Hide action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Battle Concentration
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Constitution saving throws that it makes to maintain concentration on a spell when it takes damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Battle Cry
entries: As an action make a single attack against a target, if successful all allies have advantage on their first attack until your next turn (or you become incapacitated.)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Battle Frenzy
entries: Once reduced to {#} hp or less, <$name$> makes all attacks with advantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Battle Ready
entries: The <$name$> uses its Intelligence modifer, instead of its Strength or Dexterity, for the attack and damage rolls when attacking with a weapon (included in the attacks).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the <$name$> starts its turn with {60} hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the <$name$> goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the <$name$> attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the <$name$> attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the <$name$> goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Berserk
entries: Whenever the <$name$> starts its turn with 40 hit points or fewer, roll a {@dice d6}. On a 6, the <$name$> goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the <$name$> attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the <$name$> attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the <$name$> goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points.,The <$name$>'s creator, if within 60 feet of the berserk <$name$>, can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The <$name$> must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a {@dc 15} Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check. If the check succeeds, the <$name$> ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 40 hit points or fewer, the <$name$> might go berserk again.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bestow
entries: As a bonus action <$name$> can transfer a spell or spelllike effect to an allied in an adjacent space.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Blatant Dismissal
entries: While in the courts or castles of the fey, a <$name$> that scores a successful hit with its longsword can try to force the substitution of the target with a shadow double. The target must succeed at a {@dc 10} Charisma saving throw or become {@condition invisible}, silent, and {@condition paralyzed}, while an illusory version of itself remains visible and audible—and under the monolith footman's control, shouting for a retreat or the like. Outside fey locales, this ability does not function.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Blend with Shadows
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in dim light or darkness.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Blinding Gaze
entries: When a creature that can see the <$name$> eye starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$>, the <$name$> can force it to make a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw if the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated} and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails, the creature is {@condition blinded} until the end of its next turn. Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the <$name$> until the start of its next turn. If the creature looks at the <$name$> in the meantime, it must immediately make the saving throw.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Blood Savant
entries: When subjected to a disease or poison effect that allows a Constitution saving throw to take only half damage, the <$name$> instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Blood Sense
entries: A <$name$> can pinpoint the location of living creatures within 30 feet of it and can sense the general direction of living creatures within {distance} of it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Blood Vision
entries: When the <$name$> ingests the blood of another creature, it is {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn. During that time, the <$name$> experiences a memory of the creature through its own eyes which may or may not be of the incident which caused the creature to bleed. The older the blood, the foggier and more obscure the memory is likely to be. Once the <$name$> has consumed a creature's blood in this way, the same creature's blood will never again produce a memory for that blood mage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bloodlust
entries: Each successful attack by <$name$> generates a +1 bonus to its attack rolls (to a maximum of +5) and a +2 to its damage rolls (to a maximum of +10) to its first attack on its next turn. If the <$name$> misses with an attack or fails to attack, it loses these bonuses and starts again.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bloodthirst
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that are currently below their maximum hit points.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Blurred Movement
entries: Attack rolls against the <$name$> have disadvantage unless the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bonded Weapon
entries: The <$name$>'s bonded weapon is its {weapon}. The <$name$> cannot be disarmed if it is wielding its bonded weapon. As a bonus action, the <$name$> can magically teleport its bonded weapon into its hand.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Brave Devotion
entries: Creature has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Breakaway
entries: When the <$name$> (shell) reaches 0 hit points it breaks away revealing the <$name$> (true form).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Breath Weapon
entries: A <$name$> can use its breath weapon as an attack. Its breath characteristics are determined by its draconic background, as summarized on the table. Regardless of the type of breath weapon involved, targets in the area of effect take half damage with a successful {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. Lines are 5 feet wide.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bred to the Saddle
entries: <$name$> do not take any penalties to their movement or speed due to encumbrance or carrying a single rider.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Briarstride
entries: The <$name$> is not slowed by forest terrain, can't be {@condition restrained} or slowed by entangle spells, and never takes damage from thorns, briars, or other hazardous plants in the terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Brimstone
entries: The <$name$> takes <number> ({@damage }) necrotic damage when it activates this infusion. The <$name$> can breathe poison as an action. In addition, any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Brutal Critical
entries: The <$name$> rolls one additional weapon damage die when determining extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Builder Of Hell
entries: During a long rest, <$name$> can create three flesh golems or three gorgons. The creatures are made from various fleshy and metal parts stored on Prime. The constructs obey his commands until they are slain or disassemble into pieces after 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burdock Allergy
entries: The <$name$> has a strong allergy to the burdock plant. If it comes within 20 feet of burdock flowers, it is {@condition poisoned} until it leaves the area.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Buried
entries: Until it does something to reveal its presence, a buried <$name$> is treated as if it's {@condition invisible}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burning Aura
entries: When a creature hits the <$name$> with a melee attack, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burning Belly
entries: Creatures inside a <$name$> take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) fire damage at the start of each of the <$name$> turns. Escaping from a <$name$> belly takes 10 feet of movement and a successful {@dc 16} Dexterity (Acrobatics) check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burning Blood
entries: A creature that touches the <$name$> or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it, takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage and 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. Any nonmagical weapon made of wood that hits the <$name$> burns. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition of wood that hits the <$name$> is destroyed after dealing damage. The <$name$> can burn through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood in 1 round.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burning Grip
entries: The body of a <$name$> generates intense heat. Any creature that starts its turn with one or more <$name$> onto it takes 2 fire damage for each of those <$name$>. Once a <$name$> has latched onto a character, it moves with that character when the character moves, as if the character was moving a {@condition grappled} character (half-speed). A <$name$> releases its grip when killed or when the character wins a Strength contest against it. Up to four lesser fire crabs can latch onto a Small character, and up to eight can latch onto a Medium character.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burning Rage
entries: When a <$name$> takes fire damage, it has advantage on its attack rolls until the end of its next turn. If it takes more than 5 fire damage, it has advantage on its attack rolls for 2 rounds.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burning Tangle
entries: The ground within 10 feet of the <$name$>d is difficult terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burrow
entries: <$name$> cannot burrow into solid rock, but they can move through softer material like soil or loose rubble, leaving a usable tunnel 5 feet in diameter.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burrow Awareness
entries: A <$name$> gets advantage on Perception checks if at least one other <$name$> is awake within 10 feet.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burrowing Devil
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 10 feet with it burrowing speed toward a target, the <$name$> makes its next weapon attack roll with advantage. If the attack hits, the <$name$> can make another attack with its claws against the same target as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Burrowing Roots
entries: Whenever the <$name$> makes a root attack, it can choose a point on the ground within 120 feet of it. The root bursts from the ground, and that point becomes the attack's point of origin. After attacking, the exposed root protrudes from that point, and the <$name$> gains a reaction each turn that it can only use to make an opportunity attack with that root. A root has AC 15, 45 hp, and resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bursting Arrow
entries: The target and all other creatures within 10 feet of it take an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage each.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bursting Bolt
entries: The target and all other creatures within 15 feet of it take an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage each and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Bushido
entries: As a reaction it prevents a target from taking a the evade or disengage action, within range - it gains one attack against them - and it gains advantage on attacks against that creatures until then end of the target's turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Buyback
entries: Creatures with this ability may healed within 3 rounds of being dropped to 0HP and it will raise with at least 1/2 HP

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: By Will Alone
entries: As a reaction to missing an attack, <$name$> makes a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the original attack is successful.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cadaver Fever
entries: At the end of a battle against <$name$>, anyone who was clawed or bitten by a <$name$> must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw against disease. Failure indicates the character is infected with {@disease Cadaver fever}. An infected character gains one level of {@condition exhaustion} immediately and must repeat the saving throw at the end of every long rest. Each failed saving throw adds one more level of {@condition exhaustion}; a successful saving throw at the end of a long rest means only that the character's condition doesn't worsen. The character recovers fully when he or she makes successful saving throws at the ends of two consecutive long rests or when lesser restoration or comparable magic is used on the character.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Camouflage
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in {Type} terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Carpet Bomb
entries: For every 20 feet the <$name$> flies, it dislodges an explosive scale which lands in an unoccupied space directly below it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cavern Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks while underground in caves and caverns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cavern Stalker
entries: The <$name$> can attempt to hide even when only lightly obscured by dim light.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Chameleon Hide
entries: <$name$> can hide when they are lightly obscured, they gain advantage on Dexterity {@skill Stealth}, and they have tactical advantage on {@skill Stealth} checks and initiative rolls.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Champion
entries: While <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated} or dead, other creatures of its type that are within 30ft of it have advantage against effects that {@condition charmed|charm} or {@condition frightened|frighten}. When it dies, its allies have disadvantage against effects that {@condition charmed|charm} or {@condition frightened|frighten}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can magically polymorph into a {shape list}, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Changeling
entries: <$name$> can use its action to polymorph into a {form} or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Chant of Dread
entries: Provided the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated}, an enemy that starts its turn within 60 feet of the war chanter and can hear the <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the war chanter's Chant of Dread for the next 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Chant of Ferocity
entries: Provided the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated}, an ally that starts its turn within 60 feet of the war chanter and can hear the <$name$> gains advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Chant of Resolve
entries: Provided the <$name$> isn't {@condition incapacitated}, an ally that starts its turn within 60 feet of the <$name$> and can hear the <$name$> gains advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Chaos Vulnerability
entries: The <$name$> have disadvantage on all saving throws against spells.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Charge
entries: If <$name$> moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a {specific melee} attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Chill of the Void
entries: Cold damage dealt by the <$name$> ignores resistance to cold damage, but not cold immunity.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Circle of Mortality
entries: When the <$name$> would normally roll one or more dice to restore hit points with a spell to a creature at 0 hit points, it instead uses the highest number possible for each die.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Clockworker's Charm
entries: Whenever the <$name$> casts a spell that animates, creates, or modifies an object, the spell's duration is increased by 3 minutes, if it has a duration.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Clumsy Moves
entries: While the <$name$> is neither flying nor swimming, attack rolls against it have advantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cold Aura
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the <$name$>, must make a {@dc 21} Consitution saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Colossal Swing
entries: The <$name$> can hit up to 2 Large targets, or 3 Medium or smaller targets within 5 feet of each other with each maul attack. A separate attack roll is made for each target.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Colossus Slayer (1/Turn)
entries: The <$name$> deals an additional 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage with its weapons when it hits a creature below its hit point maximum.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Combat Mobility
entries: Opportunity attacks against a moving <$name$> always have tactical disadvantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Command Iron Defender
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> targets the {@monster iron defender} it summoned and it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the <$name$>, the target can use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack, or take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, {@action Help}, or {@action Repair} action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Command Vermin
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> targets one allied beast (bat and rat types only) it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the <$name$>, the target can use its reaction to move up to half their speed and make one melee attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Companionable
entries: <$name$> can be summoned as a familiar using the find familiar spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Conspire
entries: If there are 4 or more of these creatures are together, they're effective casting for spell slot is increased by one when they cast a spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Constructed Nature
entries: <$name$> doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep. The magic that animates it dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. When 0 hit points it is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Consume Life
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can target one creature it can see within 5 feet of it that has 0 hit points and is still alive. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw against this magic or die. If the target dies, the <$name$> regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Contagious
entries: If a non-<$name$> comes into physical contact with the <$name$>, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract {@disease gnoll's kiss} (p. 34). The DC increases to 15 if this contact was the <$name$>'s bite or claw attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Contagious Lightning
entries: A creature that touches the <$name$> or hits it with a melee attack using a metal weapon receives a discharge of lightning. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or attract lightning for 1 minute. For the duration, attacks that cause lightning damage have advantage against <$name$>, the creature has disadvantage on saving throws against lightning damage and lightning effects, and if the creature takes lightning damage, it is {@condition paralyzed} until the end of its next turn. An affected creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Convoke
entries: If there are 4 or more of these creatures are together, they're effective casting for spell slot is increased by one when they cast a spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Coordinated Attack
entries: The <$name$> can add {@dice 1d4} to its attack rolls against a creature for each non{@condition incapacitated} <$name$> ally within 5 feet of the target, up to a maximum of {@dice 3d4}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Corrupting Touch
entries: A <$name$> can destroy any wooden, leather, copper, iron, or paper object by touching it as a bonus action. A mundane item is destroyed automatically; a magical item survives if its owner makes a successful {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Create Spawn
entries: A Medium or smaller humanoid slain by the <$name$> has tactical disadvantage on its death saving throws and upon its death rises at the start of the next round as a {@monster <Monster_Name> }. Roll initiative for the spawn creature separately.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Creature Sense
entries: <$name$> is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Creeping Death
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the <$name$> must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cumulative Upkeep
entries: When <$name$> enters combat make a constitution check each round DC 8 + 2 per round. When the creature fails, it falls {@condition prone} and becomes {@incapicitated} until it can successfully save.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the <$name$> can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cunning Insight {@recharge 5-6}
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> chooses a target it can see within 30 feet of it. The <$name$> and up to 3 creatures of its choice have advantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws made against the target. In addition, the target has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls made against the <$name$>. These effects last until the start of the <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cunning Presence
entries: An ally that starts is turn within 30 feet of this mastermind and can see and hear <$name$> can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action this turn, provided the mastermind isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Cycling
entries: If <$name$> is sacrificed by its summoner, it summoner gains 1/2 the spell slots back from its casting.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Darkness Incarnate
entries: The <$name$> can cast {@spell darkness} at will as a bonus action without expending verbal or material components.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dash {@recharge 5}
entries: Gain dash as a bonus action, while dashing AoO against you are at disadvantage. If <$name$>'s Dash is at least the move distance and ends at a creature's square, <$name$> can make an additional single attack as part of the dash.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes in a burst of {material}. Each creature within 5 feet of it must then succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw,  taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the <$name$> dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc #} Dexterity saving throw, taking 32 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the <$name$>'s weapons.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Deathtouch
entries: A successful strike automatically triggers a pre-emptive failed death save. If <$name$>'s attack drops its target to 0hp, it dies (no death saves allowed).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Defender
entries: Creatures that attack <$name$>, while is not {@condition incapacitated}, attack at disadvantage (ie it cannot be subject to sneak attack damage); If <$name$> takes the {@action evade} action it gains +2 to its AC.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Delve
entries: If you have the body of a <$name$> and cast a summon/conjure spell, you may specifiy <$name$> be the creature(s) summoned (if its within the correct CR value). The bodies of the <$name$> and the summoned disappear when at 0HP. <$name$> summoned in this manner have maximum HP.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Desert Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in desert terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Detect Heat
entries: The <$name$> can magically sense the presence of heat sources, including warm-blooded creatures, up to 5 miles away. It knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Detect Invisibility
entries: Within {50} feet of <$name$>, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the it's sight.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Detect Life
entries: The <$name$> can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. <$name$> knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Detect Sentience
entries: The <$name$> can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Detect Spellcasting
entries: <$name$> can sense spellcasting in a 5-mile radius, as long as the effect is not innate.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dethrone
entries: When <$name$> attacks a player's character, it crits on a 19 or 20.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Devoid
entries: <$name$> cannot be detected by locational divination.  (Detect Good or Evil; Locate Person etc)

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Devour (sacrifice)
entries: If a creature is sacrificed to it during its summoning or to it directly, <$name$> gains HP equal to the creature's HD and <x> inspiration (d8) - where x is the HD.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dimensional Bite
entries: The <$name$> can strike through a rift in space. When using an attack or multiattack action, it may attack any creature it can see within 120 ft. with its bite, independently of the bite's actual reach.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dimensional Rift
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can create an {@condition invisible} and immobile rift within an opening or frame it can see within 5 feet of it, provided that the space is no bigger than 10 feet on any side. The dimensional rift bridges the distance between that space and any point within 30 feet of it that the <$name$> can see or specify by distance and direction (such as "30 feet straight up"). While next to the rift, the <$name$> can see through it and is considered to be next to the destination as well, and anything the <$name$> puts through the rift (including a portion of its body) emerges at the destination. Only the <$name$> can use the rift, and it lasts until the end of the <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dimensional Travel
entries: The <$name$> does not need to breathe and is immune to the hazards of outer space. It can fly beyond a planet's atmosphere and travel between planets. Travelling between planets using Dimensional Travel requires {@dice 2d10} days of travel time. Riders it carries while travelling through space are also protected from the void of outer space. It can also shift to other planes at will. This functions as the plane shift spell, but doesn't require material components.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Direction Change
entries: The <$name$> can use the Disengage action as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dirge
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can perform a dirge that lasts until the start of the <$name$>'s next turn. The <$name$> can select from one of three effects:

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the <$name$> dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind its weapons and anything else it was carrying.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the <$name$> is flying and dives at least 30 feet. straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage to the target.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Double Strike
entries: +10 Initiative and +2 to hit

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Dredge
entries: When <$name$> successfully attacks; it removes the lowest availible level spell slot; sorcerery point; a use of a single use of a limited use class feature (such as Second wind; Divination; Ki) or unused HD.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Echo
entries: When Summoning <$name$>, the creature summoning it must maintain concentration until its next turn, when it must us an action - if the summoner is not able to do so the summoned creature disintegrates.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Elemental Demise
entries: If the <$name$> dies, its body disintegrates into a {elemental effect}, leaving behind only equipment the <$name$> was wearing or carrying.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Embalm
entries: When <$name$> dies, if an ally spends mana/spell slots it will return it returns as itself with Max Hit Points, but is now a celestial (immune to radiant).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Emerge
entries: A creature with this trait may be summoned by sacrificing a creature (or creatures) whose total CR meets or exceeds the creature's mana cost. t

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: <$name$>'s {Specific} attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Equip
entries: May not be used unless attuned, CP Cost is the cost to Equip

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The <$name$> can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Everchanging Changers
entries: The <$name$> are beings of pure chaos. Because their minds are pure disorder, they cannot be driven mad or {@condition charmed} and any attempts to magically compel their behavior fails.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Eviscerate
entries: If at the start of its turn the <$name$> is grappling a creature, it can use its bonus action to deal 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage to that creature.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Evolve
entries: <$name$> gains exp with combat and levels up.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Exalted
entries: Gain a +2 to attack when it attacks with other creatures with exalted.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Exert
entries: A normal gem becomes an Activated Gem with a timer equal to the number beside the Exert keyword. The timer counts down by 1 at the start of your turn. If you match the Gem or the timer reaches zero, the associated effect is triggered, and a new Gem becomes Activated at the start of your next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Exile
entries: Exiling a card moves it to the Exiled zone. Cards cannot usually be accessed after being Exiled. Exiled cards are not considered Destroyed and do not go to the graveyard. Exiling a Token removes it from the game.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Exploit
entries: When <$name$> kills a creature allied with other creatures; all its allies suffer -- losing 2d10 temporary hp (Temp HP only) and their first roll before the end of their next turn is at disadvantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Explore
entries: Convert gems equal to twice the number beside the Explore keyword to the colors of the creature targeted by your Explore effect. If a match doesn't happen, also buff the creature's power and toughness by the number beside the Explore keyword.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fabricate
entries: Bring the specified number of Supporting Servo support Tokens into play. Each of your Supporting Servo Tokens gives the first creature you control +1/+1.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: False Appearance
entries: While <$name$> remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from {stated item}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fear {@recharge 4}
entries: <$name$> attack if it strikes inflicts the {@condition frightened} condition, as if effected by the fear spell, unless the target makes a wisdom save vs {@dc 14}. A successful save grants immunity to its effect for 1 hour.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the <$name$> that starts its turn within 20 feet of the <$name$> must make a {@dc #} Wisdom saving throw, unless the <$name$> is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the <$name$>'s Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ferocious
entries: While you control a creature with a base power of at least 5, all of your creatures in play with Ferocious have their associated Ferocious effect active.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fight
entries: When two creatures Fight, each creature deals damage equal to its power to the other creature.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the <$name$>'s turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the <$name$> or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) fire damage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fire Form
entries: The <$name$> can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the <$name$> or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the <$name$> can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fire Incarnate
entries: All fire damage dealt by the dragon ignores fire resistance but not fire immunity.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: First Strike
entries: Gain a first attack round before battle starts; and +10 to iniative.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Flanking
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the <$name$>'s allies with Flanking is within 10 feet of the creature and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Flash
entries: Can summon as a reaction; Creature has Proficiency in {@skill Stealth} and can use Hide as a bonus action, and Gains a +10 to initiative.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Flashback
entries: The creature will restore themselves with ½ health {@dice 1d6} rounds after they've dropped to 0 hp; doing so removes their highest availible unused spell slot or expendes a limited use ability

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Flutterby
entries: The <$name$> seeker can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Flyby Attack
entries: When <$name$> attacks, it does not provoke an opportunity attack from the target when moving out of its reach.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fog Vision
entries: The <$name$> sees normally through light or heavy obscurement caused by fog, mist, clouds, or high wind.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Food
entries: <$name$> is edible

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Forecast (3/day)
entries: Creature takes disadvantage to grant Bardic inspiration to an allied creature within 60ft.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Forest Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in forest terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Forest Walk
entries: The <$name$> is not slowed by difficult terrain in natural forests.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Fortify
entries: When entrenched inside a object with structural points/HP - the item's threshold increases by 1.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Frenetic Dissociatio
entries: At the beginning of <$name$>'s turn, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of between 2 and 6, the sliver enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. At the beginning of the creature's next turn, it re-enters the Material Plane from the Ethereal Plane. On a roll of 1, the creature explodes in a 10-foot radius force blast. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage + 1 force damage for each sliver within 30 feet, or half as much on a successful one.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Frenzy
entries: When <$name$> attacks, and does not, between its turn and the next does not take any damage. <$name$> gains +2 to hit until end of its turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Gibbering
entries: The <$name$> babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't {@condition incapacitated}. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the <$name$> and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a {@dc 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does during its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: The <$name$> can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 20; 10 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, which can extrude a replacement tendril on its next turn. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 15} Strength check against it.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Harvest
entries: <$name$> has harvestable components used for magical, or advanced crafting projects.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Haste
entries: <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and it gains an additional action on each of its turns. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Haunt
entries: The creature that kills <$name$> becomes the target for the following effect {effect}

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Healing Rage (1/day)
entries: The <$name$> can heal {#} hit points as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Heated Weapons
entries: When the <$name$> hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Heavy Weapons
entries: The <$name$> can wield Large weapons without incurring disadvantage.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hellish Rejuvenation
entries: A <$name$> that dies in the Nine Hells comes back to life with all its hit points in {@dice 1d10} days unless it is killed by a good-aligned creature with a bless spell cast on that creature or its remains are sprinkled with holy water.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hellish Weapons
entries: The <$name$>'s weapon attacks are magical and deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a hit.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Heroic
entries: Whenever you cast a spell targeting your creature with Heroic, its associated Heroic effect is triggered.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Historic
entries: Your cards with the Historic ability have their associated effect triggered by any Legendary card, Artifact, or Saga being played on your side, or being in play on your side.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hive Mind
entries: The <$name$> gains a +1 bonus to its Intelligence and Wisdom for each <$name$> within 40 ft. of it, up to a maximum of +5.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hive Mind (Royal)
entries: <$name$> within {#} miles of their queen are in constant telepathic communication and share experiences and thoughts constantly, when one formian is aware of something, they all are.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The <$name$> can hold its breath for <number> minutes/hour.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Horrid Clacking
entries: If the <$name$> moves at least 10 feet, each beast or humanoid within 30 feet of the <$name$> that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Horrid Link (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, the  <$name$> targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. Each time the <$name$> takes damage, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage. This effect lasts until the start of the  <$name$>'s next turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Horrific Appearance
entries: Any humanoid that starts its turn within 30 feet of the <$name$> and can see the <$name$>'s true form must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the <$name$> is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the <$name$>'s Horrific Appearance for the next 24 hours.,Unless the target is surprised or the revelation of the <$name$>'s true form is sudden, the target can avert its eyes and avoid making the initial saving throw. Until the start of its next turn, a creature that averts its eyes has disadvantage on attack rolls against the <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Horsemanship
entries: While mounted, <$name$> has advantage on melee attack rolls against unmounted creatures that are smaller than its mount, and can force an attack targeted at its mount to target itself instead.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ice Armor (2/day)
entries: The <$name$> can use a bonus action to coat its body in ice, giving it +2 AC for 1 minute, or until it takes 50 points of damage from a single creature on a turn.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ice Walker
entries: A <$name$> feet have perfect grip on icy surfaces. It ignores and penalties or disadvantage to Strength and Dexterity checks or saving throws for being on a slippery surface when it is on ice. It can climb ice surfaces, such as a glacier wall or even ceiling without needing to make an ability check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ignited Illumination
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can set itself ablaze or extinguish its flames. While ablaze, the <$name$> sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Illumination
entries: The <$name$> sheds bright light in a <number>-foot radius and dim light for an additional <number> feet.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Imbue Luck (1/Day)
entries: <$name$> can enchant a small gem or stone to bring good luck. If the nichny gives this lucky stone to another creature, the bearer receives a +1 bonus to all saving throws for 24 hours.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Immortal
entries: <$name$> does not age and does not die when it drops to 0 hit points. If <$name$> drops to 0 hit points, it falls into a quiescent state for 25 weeks before returning to activity with full hit points. Its spawned elementals continue fighting whatever enemies attacked the elemental locus; if no enemies are present, they defend the locus's area.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Immunity to Energy
entries: <$name$> is immune to the energy type inherent in its <attack>, as summarized on the table.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Immunity to Illusion
entries: <$name$> automatically succeeds on saving throws against illusions and illusion spells.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Immunity to Magic
entries: <$name$> automatically succeeds on all saving throws against spells and spell-like effects. If a successful saving throw reduces damage by half, <$name$> takes no damage instead. In addition, certain spells and effects function differently against the creature, as noted below (these effects override its immunity).

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Immunity to Sleep
entries: The <$name$> automatically passes all saving throws against spells that would put it to sleep.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Immunity to Temporal Effects
entries: The <$name$> is immune to all time-related spells and effects.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Improved Critical
entries: <$name$> attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Improved Magic Resistance
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and has resistance to damage from spells.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Incorporeal
entries: <$name$> can pass through solid objects such as a wall, or other creatures, as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside another object or creature, it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage. This damage is not reduced by the <$name$> resistance.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Incorporeal Jaunt
entries: When the <$name$> moves, it becomes temporarily incorporeal. It can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage and is pushed to the closest unoccupied space if it ends its turn inside an object.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Incorporeal Swarm
entries: The <$name$> host can occupy another creature's space and vice versa; it can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. Each creature it moves through takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage; no creature can take this damage more than once per turn. The <$name$> host takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Incorporeality
entries: Any creature has disadvantage on attack rolls against <$name$>.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Indestructible
entries: <$name$> or gains DR 4 (Threshold 8 if a construct). And is immune to Disintegrate and Shatter.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Indomitable (x/day)
entries: The <$name$> can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Inexorable
entries: The <$name$> are immune to any effects that would slow them or deny them actions or movement.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Infantry Slayer
entries: While mounted, <$name$> has advantage on melee weapon attacks against creatures that are Medium or smaller and are not mounted.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Infect
entries: Target attacked takes Max HP/Ability Damage, and must save vs DC for become poisoned (save at the end of their turn

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Ingest
entries: The specified number of normal Gems of your opponent's color become Void Gems. Void Gems may be consumed by a Process ability, or matched on the board. Matching Void Gems only gives mana to cards with Devoid.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Innate Nondetection
entries: The <$name$> is extremely difficult to detect. It is affected as if under the permanent effect of a nondetection spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: <$name$> spellcasting ability is (Spell Save {@dc #}). It can innately cast the following spells:

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Insane
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Interference Aura
entries: Enemies within 30 feet must make a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw every round to maintain spells that require concentration.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Interrogator
entries: The <$name$> has a passive insight {score} against a creature speaking a lie in a language it knows.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Intimidate
entries: When <$name$> attacks, its target (if a different creature type) must save vs cannot disengage,

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Investigate
entries: A normal gem becomes an Activated Gem with a two-turn timer. The timer counts down by 1 at the start of your turn. If any player matches your Investigate Gem or its timer reaches zero, you draw a card.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Invisibility (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the <$name$> can become {@condition invisible} for 1 round.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Invisible Hand
entries: The thief gains additional benefits when it casts {@spell mage hand}. For a creature to notice the hand or the tasks the hand is performing, it must succeed on a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Invoke Duplicity
entries: The <$name$> creates a perfect illusion of itself that lasts for 1 minute or until it loses its concentration, as if concentrating on a spell. The illusion appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of <$name$>. As a bonus action, <$name$> can move the illusion up to 30 feet to a space within 120 feet of <$name$> that it can see. Additionally, when both <$name$> and its illusion are within 5 feet of a creature that can see the illusion, <$name$> has advantage on attack rolls against that creature.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Iron Boots
entries: While moving, the <$name$> has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Jungle Camouflage
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in jungle terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Keen Tracker
entries: The <$name$> has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill survival}) checks to track prey.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Kicking Retreat
entries: If the <$name$> attacks with its hooves, it can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Landwalk
entries: <$name$> can move across and climb {type of} surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of {type of terrain} doesn't cost it extra moment, leaves no tracks, creature may also choose to hide in light cover in that sort of terrain.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Leader
entries: Your Leader creature Exiles your Token creatures of the specified subtype and converts each one into a reinforcement of itself. This effect occurs both as the Leader enters play, and as you play any Token creatures of the specified subtype.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Life Eater
entries: A creature reduced to 0 hit points from damage dealt by the <$name$> dies and can't be revived by any means short of a wish spell.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lifelink
entries: Regain HP equal to ½ of the damage it deals in attacks each round.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lifesense
entries: A <$name$> notices and locates all living creatures within {60} ft., without effort or error, and it knows how close to death the creature is.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Light Hypersenstitivey
entries: <$name$> takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The <$name$> can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Lightless Depths
entries: A <$name$> is immune to the pressure effects of the deep ocean.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Like Calls To Like
entries: The <$name$> knows if a creature within 30 feet of it is similarly-aligned or not.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: The <$name$> can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The <$name$> can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The <$name$> can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within {120} feet of it that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Liquid Form
entries: The <$name$> can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as l inch wide without squeezing.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Living Construct
entries: The <$name$> is immune to disease. It does not need to eat or breathe, but can ingest food and drink if it wishes.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Low Cunning
entries: <$name$> can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Madness
entries: All of your cards with Madness gain their specified amount of mana whenever a card is Discarded (not Exiled) from your hand. A card with Madness is immune to being Discarded itself.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Arrows
entries: <$name$>'s ranged weapon attacks are magical.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Attacks
entries: <$name$>'s weapon attacks are magical.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Immunity
entries: The <$name$> is immune to damage from spells. It has advantage on saving throws against all other magical effects.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Proof
entries: <$name$> automatically succeeds on saving throws against spells and magic effects unless it chooses not to.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magic Ranged Weapons
entries: <$name$>'s ranged weapon attacks are magical.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Magma Armor
entries: When the <$name$> is below half of its maximum hp, its body cools and AC increases by +4.

makebrewCreatureTrait.name: Manifestation
